sentences.sCn: 大多数艺术家都非常我行我素。

synos.tran: 个人主义的；利己主义的

words.tran: 个人的；有个性的；具有个人特色的
个人主义；利己主义；个人特征
利己主义者，个人主义者
使…个性化；分别详述（individualize的过去分词）

trans.tranOther: If you say that someone is individualistic, you mean that they like to think and do things in their own way, rather than imitating other people. You can also say that a society is individualistic if it encourages people to behave in this way.
